description: This spiced pork recipe with rice and peas is a delicious Caribbean classic you can enjoy at home.
name: Jerk Style Pork with Rice & Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the rice, onion, garlic, black beans and coconut milk into a large saucepan with 100ml of water. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer with the lid on for 25 minutes.

Whisk the jerk seasoning with half of the lime juice, half of the zest and the oil to form a paste. Coat each pork chop in the paste. Toss the remaining lime juice and zest with pineapple in a small bowl.

Heat a large griddle pan on high and cook the pork chops for 4 minutes on each side. Stir the peas into the rice and cook uncovered for 2 minutes. Serve the chops with rice and peas and chopped pineapple on the side.
